content: half of the sts you choose to use minus 1 with the same strand of yarn pick up 21 sts along the upper side of the first square but only through the back loop this gives the seam a really neat look the last st you pick should be the very st that closes the squares 1 ws sl1kw k until the central st p1 k until the last st p1 2 rs ls1kw k until the 3 central sts sl2kwtog k1 psso k until the last st p1 repeat these two row close like the first square pattern by susanna locati ©arachnecrafts third square pick up 21 sts through the back loop only along the other side of first square with the same strand of yarn cast on other 20 sts using cable cast on follow the instructions for second square fourth square pick up 20 sts from the side of second square pick up 1 st from the corner of square 1 and then 20 sts from the side of third square follow the instructions for second square other squares you can now decide which direction grow your blanket simply repeating these instructions as needed pattern by susanna locati ©arachnecrafts pattern by susanna locati ©arachnecrafts
